document_title: Foreskin inflammation: Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_content:
Balanoposthitis is a condition in which the foreskin and glans become swollen, painful, and uncomfortable. The cause of the disease is often harmful microorganisms, commonly fungi, bacteria, viruses, and also parasites. (first)
The foreskin is a thin layer of skin that covers the head of the penis and the urinary opening. When the penis becomes erect due to stimulation, the foreskin will be pulled down, revealing the head of the penis.

The foreskin is a thin layer of skin that covers the head of the penis and the urinary opening. When the penis becomes erect due to stimulation, the foreskin will be pulled down, revealing the head of the penis.
